text.front:
Editorial
Venous Thromboembolism
Prophylaxis in the Craniotomy
Patient: an Editorial
Ursula Guidry, M.D.,* Peter McLaren Black, M.D., Ph.D., † and
Samuel Z. Goldhaber, M.D.*
*Cardiovascular Division, Department of Medicine, and the †Division of Neurosurgery,
Department of Surgery, Brigham and Women's Hospital, Harvard Medical School,
Boston, Massachusetts
Guidry U, McLaren Black P, Goldhaber SZ. Venous thromboem-
bolism prophylaxis in the craniotomy patient: an editorial. Surg
Neurol 1998;50:182-3.
KEY WORDS
Craniotomy, prevention, deep venous thrombosis, pulmo-
nary embolism, clinical trial.
Address reprint requests to:
Dr. Samuel Z. Goldhaber, M.D.,
Cardiovas-
cular Division, Brigham and Women's Hospital,
75 Francis Street; Boston,
MA 02115.
